I am a 3rd year applied mathematics PhD candidate at Dartmouth College, originally from Dallas, Texas. I study computational methods for solving (inverse) problems and uncertainty quantification. My advisor is [Anne Gelb](https://math.dartmouth.edu/~annegelb/).
